func.title: SetClrModulation

param.name: color
param.desc: Color value to be modulated with.

param.name: overlay_id
param.desc: If specified, sets the color modulation of the graphics overlay instead. The overlay must have been created using SetGraphics first. From CR.

func.desc: Changes the color modulation of an object. This is a color value which is multiplied with the object color. RGB(255,0,0) will only let the red part of the color show. RGBa(255,255,255,128) will make all color half transparent (unless alpha addition is disabled in the graphics options).

example.text: Colors the selected clonk of the first player slightly blue and makes him half transparent.
